title: Sterlite Power gets Rs 2,400 cr funding from REC arm for Beawar project
description: Sterlite Power has secured Rs 2,400 crore funding from REC Power Development and Consultancy Ltd (RECPDCL) for its Beawar transmission project in Rajasthan. The project, which aims to evacuate around 20 GW of renewable energy, will involve the construction of a 350 km, 765kV transmission corridor and a 3000 MVA 765/400kV substation.
